alert.note: Alert for Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 4:30PM PST until March 10 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sacramento Valley and Northeast Foothills/Sacramento Valley Counties. * WHEN...Through 1 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 400 to 1500 feet this afternoon, rising to 6000 to 8000 feet later tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley
